base_url = 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com', common_headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}

    @pytest.mark.smoke
    def test_update_post_put(base_url, common_headers):
        """测试 PUT 方法完整更新一个帖子"""
    
        put_id = 101
        put_url = f"{base_url}/post/{put_id}"
        payload = {
            "id": put_id,
            "title": "更新后的title",
            "body": "更新后的body",
            "userId": 1
        }
        response = requests.put(put_url, json=payload, headers=common_headers)
